title: Install Minecraft on your Steam Deck the EASY WAY.

media:group.media:title: Install Minecraft on your Steam Deck the EASY WAY.
media:group.media:description:
In this video, I'll teach you how to set up Minecraft on the Steam Deck and we'll review how to add it to your Steam Library so you can play Minecraft in Steam Deck's Game Mode. Plus, we'll talk about setting up the controller to work on Deck!
